content.query:
select * from sys.external_tables

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Pa$$w0rdPa$$w0rd'
GO
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [st]
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
     SECRET = '?sv=2021-06-08&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupx&se=2023-06-13T06:33:08Z&st=2022-06-12T22:33:08Z&spr=https&sig=0roZjFqb0NBR%2F2LnYBalRLsn06ie6tpaFVxkwZSpWfo%3D';
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE DS2
WITH (    LOCATION   = 'https://adls5005.dfs.core.windows.net/input',
          CREDENTIAL = st
)

USE SERVERLESSDB1
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE DS3
WITH (    LOCATION   = 'https://adls5005.dfs.core.windows.net/output',
          CREDENTIAL = st
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CsvFormat2 WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
      FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
      STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
      FIRST_ROW = 2,
      USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE,
      ENCODING = 'UTF8' )
);
GO
